name: Trouble in Central Park
text: Uses (3 foe counters). Victory 0. Forced Action: Seek a minion from the encounter deck and put it into play engaged with you → remove 1 foe counter from here. That enemy attacks you. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: "I have neglected my people. They have suffered." —Throg

name: Adorable Distraction
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. Alligator Loki cannot be attacked. (Throg's nemesis side scheme.) [crisis]
flavor: Alligator Loki is distracting everybody with his cuteness. Somebody, pet him so we can get back to saving the day!

name: Alligator Loki
text: Forced Response: After Alligator Loki enters play, find Chomped and attach it to your identity. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Alligator Loki schemes and places threat, place that much threat on each side scheme. [star] Alligator Loki's attacks gain piercing.

name: Causing a Commotion
text: When Revealed: Each player discards the top 3 cards of their deck and places 1 threat here for each different card type they discarded this way. [hazard]
flavor: Alligator Loki is making a scene and causing havoc! Somebody catch him before he makes an even bigger mess!

name: "Lost" Property
text: When Revealed: Each player tucks an identity-specific upgrade they control under this card. It cannot be found while under here. When Defeated: Add each card under here to its owner's hand.
flavor: That scamp took our stuff! Catch him and get it back, no matter how cute he looks with it!

name: Chomped
text: Attach to your identity. Forced Interrupt: When the round ends, take 1 damage. Forced Interrupt: When you would use a basic power, discard Chomped and take 1 damage instead. [star] Boost: Reveal this card.
